tit.e: Shimazu Foundation Memorial Hall(島津創業記念資料館)
tit.cmt: 公式ウェブの記載に修正しました。("Shimazu"ではなく"Shimadzu"となっていたためこちらを採用しました。参照: http://www.shimadzu.com/visionary/memorial-hall/)

sen.j: 島津創業記念資料館（しまづそうぎょうきねんしりょうかん）は、島津製作所が1975年に創業100周年を記念して、創業者の島津源蔵を偲んで開設した資料館。
sen.e: Shimazu Foundation Memorial Hall is a museum of Shimazu history that Shimazu Corporation opened in 1975 on the centennial anniversary of its foundationto commemorate its founder Genzo SHIMAZU.
Shimazu Foundation Memorial Hall is a museum of Shimazu family history, opened by Shimazu Corporation in 1975 on the centennial anniversary of its foundationto commemorate its founder Genzo SHIMAZU.

Shimadzu Foundation Memorial Hall is a museum of Shimazu family history, opened by Shimadzu Corporation in 1975 on the centennial anniversary of its foundationto commemorate its founder Genzo SHIMAZU.
sen.cmt: Shimadzu Foundation Memorial Hallとしました。「島津製作所」→公式ウェブの表記に修正 (参照: http://www.shimadzu.com/about/profile/index.html)

sen.j: 南棟（1888年建設）と北棟（1894年建設）からなり、創業初期に島津の住居・研究所として使われていた建物を保存・公開している。
sen.e: It consists of the south building (built in 1888) and the north building (built in 1894), which were the Shimazus's home and the laboratory when the company was founded, and are preserved now.

It consists of the south building (built in 1888) and the north building (built in 1894), which together were the Shimazus's home and the laboratory when the company was founded, and both are preserved now.

It consists of the south building (built in 1888) and the north building (built in 1894), which together were the Shimazus's home and the laboratory when the company was founded, and both are preserved now.

sen.j: 南棟・北棟ともに登録有形文化財（1999年12月登録）である。
sen.e: The both buildings are designated as Registered Tangible Cultural Properties (registered in December 1999).
Both buildings are designated as Registered Tangible Cultural Properties (registered in December 1999).

sen.e: It displays not only writings and instruments, but exhibits panels related to Koichi TANAKA, a Nobel Award winner, as well.
